channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unforced errors

item.title: UFC 309 Weigh-In Results: 1 Fighter On The Card Misses Weight

item.title: The AirPods Pro’s Game-Changing Health Feature, Explained By Apple Execs

item.title: Scaling Small Language Models (SLMs) For Edge Devices: A New Frontier In AI
item.description: The growing prominence of SLMs is reshaping the AI world, placing a greater emphasis on efficiency, privacy and real-time functionality.

item.title: E-Scooter Laws In The UK? Keep Waiting, It’ll Be A While
item.description: Transport Secretary Louise Haigh has promised to legislate on e-scooters, but not until the next parliamentary session at soonest
